name: HAL - Predictive Business Intelligence
description: Comprehensive AI system that connects to business data sources, predicts market shifts 3-6 months ahead, and automatically adjusts strategies before competitors react

steps.name: Generate Core Data Intelligence Foundation
steps.prompt: Create the foundational data intelligence system using AGNO framework. Build DataIngestionAgent that connects to multiple data sources (APIs, databases, files), DataValidationAgent that ensures data quality and consistency, and DataProcessingAgent that cleans and structures incoming data. Include a FastAPI backend with endpoints for data source management, real-time data monitoring, and data quality dashboards. Create database schemas for storing historical data, market signals, and business metrics. The system should handle high-volume real-time data streams and provide data lineage tracking.

objective.task: Evolve the system to include sophisticated market analysis capabilities with specialized AGNO agents for comprehensive market intelligence.
constraints: Implement MarketSignalAgent that monitors news feeds, social media, financial markets, and industry reports
Create CompetitorAnalysisAgent that tracks competitor activities, pricing changes, and strategic moves
Build EconomicIndicatorAgent that analyzes GDP, inflation, employment data, and central bank policies
Add SentimentAnalysisAgent that processes social media and news sentiment around markets and brands
Integrate MarketIntelligenceTeam that coordinates all market analysis agents using AGNO delegation
Include real-time alerting system for significant market events and competitor actions
Add market trend visualization and interactive dashboards for market conditions
Implement data fusion algorithms that combine multiple market signals into coherent insights

objective.task: Add advanced predictive capabilities with machine learning models and scenario planning for 3-6 month market forecasting.
constraints: Create TrendForecastingAgent using ensemble ML models (LSTM, ARIMA, Prophet) for time series prediction
Implement ScenarioModelingAgent that generates multiple future scenarios with probability assessments
Build RiskAssessmentAgent that quantifies uncertainty and identifies potential black swan events
Add PatternRecognitionAgent that identifies recurring market cycles and seasonal patterns
Integrate PredictiveEngineTeam that orchestrates all forecasting agents with consensus mechanisms
Include Monte Carlo simulations for stress testing and sensitivity analysis
Add model validation framework with backtesting and performance metrics
Implement automated model retraining based on prediction accuracy and new data patterns

objective.task: Create intelligent strategy optimization that can automatically adjust business tactics based on market predictions and business objectives.
constraints: Implement PricingOptimizationAgent that adjusts prices based on demand forecasts and competitor analysis
Create InventoryOptimizationAgent that manages stock levels using demand predictions and supply chain data
Build MarketingOptimizationAgent that allocates budgets across channels based on predicted ROI
Add ResourceAllocationAgent that optimizes human resources and operational capacity
Integrate StrategyOptimizationTeam that coordinates all optimization agents with multi-objective goals
Include what-if analysis tools for testing strategy changes before implementation
Add automated A/B testing framework for validating optimization recommendations
Implement constraint-based optimization that respects business rules and regulatory requirements

objective.task: Build comprehensive execution capabilities that can automatically implement strategy changes across business systems.
constraints: Implement SystemIntegrationAgent with APIs to CRM (Salesforce), ERP (SAP), and marketing platforms
Create WorkflowExecutionAgent that orchestrates multi-step business process changes
Build ApprovalWorkflowAgent that manages human-in-the-loop validation for high-impact decisions
Add AuditTrailAgent that logs all automated decisions and changes for compliance and review
Integrate ExecutionCoordinatorTeam that manages all execution agents with rollback capabilities
Include real-time monitoring of executed changes with performance impact tracking
Add automated rollback mechanisms if strategy changes produce negative outcomes
Implement notification systems for stakeholders when significant changes are executed

objective.task: Create comprehensive analytics platform with advanced visualization, reporting, and business intelligence capabilities.
constraints: Implement AnalyticsEngineAgent that generates insights and KPI tracking across all business functions
Create ReportGenerationAgent that produces automated executive reports with actionable insights
Build VisualizationAgent that creates dynamic dashboards and interactive data exploration tools
Add AlertSystemAgent that monitors business metrics and triggers notifications for anomalies
Integrate BusinessIntelligenceTeam that coordinates all analytics agents with unified reporting
Include customizable dashboard builder for different stakeholder needs (C-suite, managers, analysts)
Add natural language query interface for asking business questions in plain English
Implement automated insight discovery that identifies hidden patterns and opportunities

objective.task: Add enterprise-grade security, compliance, and governance capabilities to ensure safe autonomous business operations.
constraints: Implement SecurityMonitoringAgent that protects against data breaches and unauthorized access
Create ComplianceValidationAgent that ensures all decisions meet regulatory requirements
Build RiskGovernanceAgent that enforces risk limits and escalation procedures
Add DataPrivacyAgent that manages GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy regulation compliance
Integrate GovernanceFrameworkTeam that coordinates all security and compliance agents
Include role-based access control with multi-factor authentication for sensitive operations
Add comprehensive audit logging with tamper-proof records for regulatory compliance
Implement automated compliance reporting and risk assessment documentation
